snippet: The Olympic discus silver medalist Darya Pishchalnikova was barred for 10 years for doping and will be stripped of her medal, the Russian track federation said.
lead_paragraph: The Olympic discus silver medalist Darya Pishchalnikova was barred for 10 years for doping and will be stripped of her medal, the Russian track federation said.

headline.main: 10-Year Ban for Russian Woman Who Won Silver in Discus
